title: Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
subject: Software Engineering
theory:
Framework defining tasks performed at each step in software development process. 
Ensures quality and correctness. 
Avoids Ad-hoc coding.

common_mistakes.correction: Jumping to code without design usually leads to failure.

interview_questions.question: What is SDLC?
interview_questions.answer: A process used by software industry to design, develop and test high quality softwares.
